initializeparameters module¶

class initializeparameters.InitializeParameters(layer_dims)¶

Bases: object

initialize()¶

Arguments: layer_dims – python array (list) containing the dimensions of each layer in our network

Returns: parameters – python dictionary containing your parameters “W1”, “b1”, …, “WL”, “bL”:

Wl – weight matrix of shape (layer_dims[l], layer_dims[l-1]) bl – bias vector of shape (layer_dims[l], 1)
